content: this gorgeous mulberry wine earwarmer is so quick and easy to make and goes perfectly with the mulberry wine infinity scarf 1 the mulberry wine earwarmer is one of the november contributions to the 2020 hat of the month club > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 92-105 yds of category 5 bulky yarn i used lion brand scarfie in the charcoal/magenta colorway * size k 6 5mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mulberry-wine-infinity-scarf
